name: HolidayCountdown
0:
”Alexa open holiday countdown”
”How many days till christmass”
”when is turkey day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: holiday countdown
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask Alexa how many days until a popular holiday. Alexa will reply with the number of days and a quote related to that holiday. If you have a suitable device the days and quote will be displayed.

Currently supports Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmass and Wulfenoot. More holidays will be added as the skill grows
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
